hypothesis_content.title: Whale Accumulation Signal Preceding Liquidity Inflows
hypothesis_content.statement: When top 10 non-exchange BTC wallets accumulate >15,000 BTC aggregate over 7 days during NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes, and this coincides with declining stablecoin exchange reserves (-5%+ weekly), subsequent BTC price appreciation of >8% occurs within 10 days as liquidity rotates from stables to BTC.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Whale accumulation during stablecoin reserve drawdowns signals smart money positioning for incoming liquidity rotation. This often precedes retail/institutional flows as confidence returns.
entry_conditions: Top 10 non-exchange whale wallets net accumulation >15,000 BTC past 7d
Aggregate stablecoin exchange reserves down >5% week-over-week
BTC trading in consolidation range (±5% over 10 days)
Funding rates neutral to slightly negative (≤ -0.005%)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 10% BTC gain OR stablecoin reserves reverse to increasing
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC breaks below consolidation range low -3%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If BTC price fails to appreciate >3% within 10 days despite meeting all accumulation/reserve conditions in >60% of instances.
